body_html:
@jbobba thanks. As far as config, I'm building using the CMake build on Windows with CUDA/NVIDIA GPU enabled.

CMake command (obviously adjust with your personalized environment settings)

cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -G "Visual Studio 14 2015" ^
-DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=Drive:/Path/to/swigwin-3.0.12/swig.exe ^
-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=Drive:/Path/to/anaconda3/python.exe ^
-DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=Drive:/Path/to/anaconda3/libs/python36.lib ^
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON ^
-DCUDNN_HOME="Drive:/Path/to/cudnn-9.0-windows10-x64-v7.1/cuda" ^
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_MKL_SUPPORT=ON ^
-DMKL_HOME="C:/Program Files (x86)/IntelSWTools/compilers_and_libraries" ^
-Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX2 ^
-Dtensorflow_BUILD_PYTHON_TESTS=OFF ^
-Dtensorflow_BUILD_CC_TESTS=OFF ^
-Dtensorflow_TF_NIGHTLY=OFF

Can then open Tensorflow.sln or build the example with

MSBuild /p:Configuration=Release tf_tutorials_example_trainer.vcxproj
Release\tf_tutorials_example_trainer.exe

Depending on your environment, you might need to run this script first

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\vcvarsall.bat"

body:
@jbobba thanks. As far as config, I'm building using the CMake build on Windows with CUDA/NVIDIA GPU enabled. 

CMake command (obviously adjust with your personalized environment settings)

```
cmake .. -A x64 -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -G "Visual Studio 14 2015" ^
-DSWIG_EXECUTABLE=Drive:/Path/to/swigwin-3.0.12/swig.exe ^
-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=Drive:/Path/to/anaconda3/python.exe ^
-DPYTHON_LIBRARIES=Drive:/Path/to/anaconda3/libs/python36.lib ^
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_GPU=ON ^
-DCUDNN_HOME="Drive:/Path/to/cudnn-9.0-windows10-x64-v7.1/cuda" ^
-Dtensorflow_ENABLE_MKL_SUPPORT=ON ^
-DMKL_HOME="C:/Program Files (x86)/IntelSWTools/compilers_and_libraries" ^
-Dtensorflow_WIN_CPU_SIMD_OPTIONS=/arch:AVX2 ^
-Dtensorflow_BUILD_PYTHON_TESTS=OFF ^
-Dtensorflow_BUILD_CC_TESTS=OFF ^
-Dtensorflow_TF_NIGHTLY=OFF
```

Can then open Tensorflow.sln or build the example with

```
MSBuild /p:Configuration=Release tf_tutorials_example_trainer.vcxproj
Release\tf_tutorials_example_trainer.exe
```
Depending on your environment, you might need to run this script first 

`"C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0\VC\vcvarsall.bat"`
